verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Love, joy and peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faithfulness, gentleness, and self control. (2x){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}This is the fruit of the Life of the Spirit That we should bear. This is the fruit of the Life within us That we can share.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Without this fruit of the Life of the Spirit Our lives are bare. Without this fruit growing up within us Weâ€™ve none to share.{/lang-eng}
